definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: In my opinion, this is also a pair of antonyms.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，這又是一對反義詞。

sentences.english: Some common parameters have synonyms, and a few have antonyms.
sentences.chinese: 一些常見的參數有同義詞，而少數具有反義詞。

sentences.english: How can you find antonyms in the thesaurus?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼能在同義詞典中發現反義詞呢？

sentences.english: Please give a synonym and antonym for this word.
sentences.chinese: 請說出這個詞的同義詞和反義詞。
臨時的反義詞是永久的。

sentences.english: Antonyms of this kind are characteristic of semantic polarity.
sentences.chinese: 這種反義詞的特點是語義二極性。

sentences.english: Learning an antonym for each new word can help you increase your vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 學習新詞的反義詞也可以擴展你的詞彙量。

sentences.english: Also make sure to learn synonyms or antonyms.
sentences.chinese: 當然對於它的近義詞與反義詞我們也要掌握。

sentences.english: Antonyms are words of opposite meaning.
sentences.chinese: 反義詞是指意思相反的詞。

sentences.english: The opposite of smooth and flat.
sentences.chinese: 我知道這個肆意的反義詞，就是平滑。

sentences.english: Plaintiff is an antonym of defendant.
That's the opposite of proactive: antipassive, presumably.
sentences.chinese: 主動的反義詞大概是被動。

definition: (used to modify 事情[shi4 qing5]) serious/grave
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
to play tricks on/to make fun of/to tease
lit. no antidote is possible (idiom); incurable/incorrigible/beyond redemption
to force someone to do something
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3
